thaman methek pawasa athi anawaki siyalla idiri kalayedi ee ayurinma siduwanu athi bawa pa්rawina jyethirwedi wijith rohana wijemuni mahatha pawasayi.

marthu masaye di pawathi 28wana sasiwaraye warthawa idiripath kirima kal thabana ladde pahadili deshapalana thiranayak anuwaya shri lankawe aandu peraliyen pasu jiniwahi 2009 mohotha ehi prathiwiruddhaya lesa dan aapasu pamina thibe. 2009 wasarehi di yuropa sangamaye mulikathwayen shri lankawe yuddhaye awasan samaye siduwu bawata chodana karena barapathala manawa himikam soya balime aramunin manawa himikam kawunsilaye wishesha sasiwarayak kandawana ladi.

sabandi puwathkamitu pita kamitu wartha natha shi්ra lankawa noyekuth karunu sambandhayen kamitu pita kamitu […]ostreliyawa anawasara sankramanikayinta erehiwa dadi piyawara gani yathra magin siya ratata athuluwimata thath karana anawasara […]lenin usawiye naha-usawiya thawamath nihandayi prasanna withanage mahatha adhyakshanaya kala "usawiya nihadayi" […]aden wati hamuda sebaleku maruta ande nida sitiyadi bimata watimen hamuda sebaleku miyagiya puwathak […]bandumkara mama bana sellame thawath helidarawwak bandumkara maha mulya mankolla sidu weddi dasaya wani sthanaye […]labana wasare wiyadam athulath wisarjana panath ketum patha heta parlimenthuwata………

subhashini jayarathnamahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumage upades matha “web patashala” wadasatahana pasugiyada aarambha wu athara mehi mul watayedi jathika pasal 342 ka widuhalpathiwarun sandaha adhyapana mrudukanga pakejaya athulu laptop upakarana beda dima da sidu kerina.antharjalaya osse daruwange adhyapanaya shakthimath karana mema wishesha wadasatahana mangin pasal adhyapanayata amatharawa upakaraka athpothak lesa meya bhawitha kirimata da hakiyawa atha.mema web patashala wadasatahana yatathe jathika adhyapana aayathanaya wisin anumatha karana lada, pelapothwala adangu wishaya mala adhyapana mrudukanga pakejayanhi anthargatha kara atha.mema ‘web patashala’ wadasatahana shri lanka rajya wanija wiwidha nithigatha sansthawa, adhyapana amathyanshaya, jathika adhyapana aayathanaya saha etisalat lanka paudgalika samagama ekwa idiripath karana buddhimaya wyapruthiyaki.wadi wisthara 0722782782 osse labagatha haka.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
